amendment.description: Amendment deletes section 614 of the bill relating to the liability standards applied to third-party independent contractors working for a bank.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-439 to strike section 614 relating to the liability standards applied to third-party independent contractors working for a bank.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Bachus.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
